At NDA, Oleksandr Holyshevskyi manages the IVVQ team, defines the test strategy of the solution, manages all IVVQ activities, determines test effort and risks at the solution level, ensures global consistencies, leads the development and execution of test strategies, test cases, and automation frameworks tailored to desktop applications, collaborates with cross-functional teams to identify, analyze, and resolve defects, drives continuous improvements in QA methodologies and processes, and leverages QA tools and techniques to automate tests, conduct performance evaluations, and ensure seamless integration.
